Info.Title: 12 Monkeys
Info.Writer: Chris Marker (film La Jet√©e), David Webb Peoples (screenplay), Janet Peoples (screenplay)
Info.Actors: Joseph Melito, Bruce Willis, Jon Seda, Michael Chance
Info.Plot: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 9 wins & 18 nominations.
